channel.title: Java Runtime Environment Problem
channel.description:
i've been trying to run and use a 317 since i updated to Windows 7 but whenever i run one and try to move on it the client closes completely and the server goes offline with an error message like this: [code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a486, pid=3756, t id=4240 # # JRE version: 6.0_20-b02 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.3-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x5a486] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Matt\Desktop\CreativeScape\hs_err_pid3756.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp[/code]
i have the newest JDK and JRE can someone help?

no problem, just use that from now on

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Jomasterjo:

It didn’t work…

dont use the run.bat one, use the one that says application

Read full topic

item.title: Java Runtime Environment Problem
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

  1. Ok First you need to download this - http://uppit.com/v/REKLK274

2.Open that up and click Windows 7 Coverter

3.Then You will see a line that says ( Batch File: ) Click the ( … ) on that line then a brows will pop up and go to your client folder and click your .bat that you use to run your client.

4.Then push compile.

5.Now your done! go back to your client folder and if you have a windows 7 computer you can play 317’s now and it wont crash the client.

credits to locksmin

Read full topic

item.title: Java Runtime Environment Problem
item.dc:creator: @Jomasterjo Jomasterjo
item.description:
@Jomasterjo wrote:

i’ve been trying to run and use a 317 since i updated to Windows 7 but whenever i run one and try to move on it the client closes completely and the server goes offline with an error message like this:

[code]#

A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a486, pid=3756, t

id=4240

JRE version: 6.0_20-b02

Java VM: Java HotSpot™ 64-Bit Server VM (16.3-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64

)

Problematic frame:

V [jvm.dll+0x5a486]

An error report file with more information is saved as:

C:\Users\Matt\Desktop\CreativeScape\hs_err_pid3756.log

If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp[/code]

i have the newest JDK and JRE can someone help?
